quick_wins.title: Install Frontend Dependencies
quick_wins.description: Run `npm install` in frontend directory to resolve 1,227 of 1,292 TypeScript errors

quick_wins.title: Export Entity Type
quick_wins.description: Add 'export' keyword to Entity type in useHierarchy.ts to fix TS2459 error
quick_wins.expected_outcome: Fixes last remaining TypeScript compilation error

quick_wins.title: Add Performance Threshold Enforcement
quick_wins.description: Log warning when LTREE refresh exceeds 1000ms target

quick_wins.title: Document Automated LTREE Endpoints
quick_wins.description: Add documentation for 4 undocumented automated refresh endpoints
quick_wins.expected_outcome: API consumers aware of automated refresh features

quick_wins.title: Document WebSocket Message Types
quick_wins.description: Add schemas for 7 undocumented WebSocket message types

quick_wins.title: Fix Hardcoded map_v1 Check
quick_wins.description: Replace hardcoded 'return True' with actual database flag query

quick_wins.title: Remove Duplicate Files
quick_wins.description: Delete obsolete backup and empty files

quick_wins.title: Add SLO Response Field
quick_wins.description: Include slo_compliant boolean in LTREE refresh API response

quick_wins.title: Create .env.example
quick_wins.description: Document required environment variables for local development
quick_wins.expected_outcome: Easier local setup for new developers

quick_wins.title: Add Response Model Validation
quick_wins.description: Use Pydantic BaseModel for LTREE refresh endpoint responses
quick_wins.change: Add: class RefreshResponse(BaseModel): status: str; duration_ms: float; ...
quick_wins.expected_outcome: Type-safe API responses, automatic OpenAPI generation

bucket_a_candidates.description: Code-only fixes that compile and pass static checks without services

bucket_b_candidates.note: No quick wins require services - all are code-only or documentation
